text: “Ndu Heven gum Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigi, nde Zisas farasegi ŋaara gumgi, nde Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ gumgi, nde ntigem mbu ŋgu bakɨmen hɨgi bigeŋ, nde ne ga suaŋv ndikndigɨri. Fhe Bakɨme, ana muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi gangiap, ntan tugɨra tɨgi vheza mbatɨgar ana nɨɨŋgi. Ana mba tɨva mbui, ne khaŋ muuŋgi. Ana mba ŋgu bakɨme nde muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi, ana ntan ŋgarɨga muuŋgi.”
